paper_abstract: This paper presents results from three years of studying human-robot interaction in the context of the AAAI Robot Rescue Competition. We discuss our study methodology, the competitors' systems and performance, and suggest ways to improve human-robot interaction in urban search and rescue (USAR) as well as other remote robot operations.
paper_title: Rescuing interfaces: A multi-year study of human-robot interaction at the AAAI Robot Rescue Competition
